name: Entropy Lance
customPrimary:
%s: Converts built-up flux as additional power, this increases the firing duration of the Entropy Lance. Any amount of flux will be shunted first before the weapon can fire.

%s: Direct interactions with target matter will raise its %s by %s upon initial impact.
customPrimaryHL: Flux Inverter | Flux Spiker | flux level | 30%
customAncillary: Disables the defense system of the ship and all weapons when firing.

name: Gungnir Relic Railgun
customPrimary:
%s: Allows projectile to pierce through multiple ships, inflicting both EMP and physical damage with each penetration.

%s: Projectile damages even phased ships while passing through them, making it truly impossible to evade.
customPrimaryHL: Rods from God | Gungnir never misses
customAncillary: %s: Each shot generates immense stress on the weapon systems, disabling it for %s seconds after firing.
